Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
14.8 String Functions and Operators
Description: Return a string containing octal representation of a number

Returns a string representation of the octal value of
          N, where
          N is a longlong
          (BIGINT) number. This is
          equivalent to
          CONV(N,10,8).
          Returns NULL if
          N is NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT OCT(12);
        -> '14'
